title: Fizz is OP.
body:
One Q-W Auto with Lich Bane and I'm on half health, even though I have 111 MR and I can't build HP because he does percent damage on top.

If he sharked me first I'da been dead instantly and I know Ahri gains no MR per level so she has less than most would but with 111 MR it's a bit stupid that with no items other than Lich Bane he can do this.

replies.body:
If you had the gold to get 111 MR from Abysall and Athenes, I doubt the Fizz only had Lich Bane.

Your runes plus base gave you 42MR.
At the point you had 111 MR, Fizz had Lich Bane and Zhonyas. The Fizz also had some AP Marks and Glyphs. So he had a tonne of AP.

http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/88322582/200200744?tab=builds&participant=5

I had Grail and Abyssal by the time he had Lich Bane and a Needless but my point is the MR did nothing and he still QW me to almost half health and you can't build HP to deal with him. It's a bit stupid he can build raw damage and you can build heavy MR and he can still do that kind of burst relatively easily.

Your like a little kid caught in a lie, better make up more lies to cover it up LOL
You can see each players build with timestamps...

You finished Abysall at 24:59... He finished Zhonyas at 24:03

Fizz is not OP.
I'm not lying I was mistaken, but that's still only ~40 AP more than I thought he had at that time and a ridiculous amount of burst versus 111 MR.

Man if you're complaining he's OP now you should have seen him before his changes... He really isn't as obnoxious as he used to be, just make sure he can't free farm and push your gold advantage without giving him an opportunity to snowball either from your lane or the others ({{item:2044}} )
